name: Impossible Arena: Are you as good as you think?
nameFr: Impossible Arena: Are you as good as you think?
nameEn: Impossible Arena: Are you as good as you think?
description: Can you solve the impossible Arena? The only way to find out is to start. Enter this escape game and challenge both your programming and thinking skills.
